tool_description: Retrieve company logos, employees and information.
name: Clearbit
title: Clearbit

api_list.name: autocompleteCompany
api_list.description: Lets you auto-complete company names and retreive logo and domain information.

api_list.name: findCompany
api_list.description: Allows you to look up a company by their domain

optional_parameters.name: webhookUrl
optional_parameters.description: A webhook URL that results will be sent to.

optional_parameters.name: twitter
optional_parameters.description: The Twitter handle for the company.

optional_parameters.name: linkedin
optional_parameters.description: The LinkedIn URL for the company.

optional_parameters.name: facebook
optional_parameters.description: The Facebook URL for the company.

optional_parameters.name: companyName
optional_parameters.description: The name of the company.

api_list.name: findCompanyLogo

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: Image size: length of longest side in pixels (default is 128)

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Image format, either "png" or "jpg" (defaults to png)

optional_parameters.name: greyscale
optional_parameters.description: Desaturates image if passed (defaults to false)

api_list.name: findInfoByEmail
api_list.description: This endpoint expects an email address, and will return an object containing both the person and company (if found). A call to the combined lookup will only count as one API call.

optional_parameters.name: familyName
optional_parameters.description: Last name of person. If you have this, passing this is strongly recommended to improve match rates.

optional_parameters.name: companyDomain
optional_parameters.description: The domain for the person’s employer.

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: The city or country where the person resides.

optional_parameters.name: webhookUrl
optional_parameters.description: A webhook URL that results will be sent to.

optional_parameters.name: webhookId
optional_parameters.description: Custom identifier for the webhook request.

optional_parameters.name: twitter
optional_parameters.description: The Twitter handle for the person.

optional_parameters.name: facebook
optional_parameters.description: The Facebook URL for the person.

optional_parameters.name: ipAddress
optional_parameters.description: IP address of the person. If you have this, passing this is strongly recommended to improve match rates.

optional_parameters.name: subscribe
optional_parameters.description: Set to true to subscribe to the changes to the person.

optional_parameters.name: givenName
optional_parameters.description: First name of person.

optional_parameters.name: linkedin
optional_parameters.description: The LinkedIn URL for the person.

optional_parameters.name: company
optional_parameters.description: The name of the person’s employer.

api_list.name: findPerson
api_list.description: Lets you retrieve social information associated with an email address, such as a person’s name, location and Twitter handle.

optional_parameters.name: companyDomain
optional_parameters.description: The domain for the person’s employer.

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: The city or country where the person resides.

optional_parameters.name: familyName
optional_parameters.description: Last name of person. If you have this, passing this is strongly recommended to improve match rates.

optional_parameters.name: webhookUrl
optional_parameters.description: A webhook URL that results will be sent to.

optional_parameters.name: twitter
optional_parameters.description: The Twitter handle for the person.

optional_parameters.name: linkedin
optional_parameters.description: The LinkedIn URL for the person.

optional_parameters.name: company
optional_parameters.description: The name of the person’s employer.

optional_parameters.name: ipAddress
optional_parameters.description: IP address of the person. If you have this, passing this is strongly recommended to improve match rates.

optional_parameters.name: givenName
optional_parameters.description: First name of person.

optional_parameters.name: facebook
optional_parameters.description: The Facebook URL for the person.

api_list.name: flagCompanyInfoAsIncorrect
api_list.description: You can flag a company as incorrect and also optionally pass through a correct set of attributes.

required_parameters.name: companyId
required_parameters.description: Id of the company you’d like to flag as inaccurate.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Name of company.

optional_parameters.name: facebookHandle
optional_parameters.description: Facebook ID or screen name

optional_parameters.name: emailProvider
optional_parameters.description: Is the domain associated with a free email provider (i.e. Gmail)?

optional_parameters.name: twitterHandle
optional_parameters.description: Twitter screen name

optional_parameters.name: raised
optional_parameters.description: Total amount raised

optional_parameters.name: employees
optional_parameters.description: Amount of employees

optional_parameters.name: crunchbaseHandle
optional_parameters.description: Crunchbase handle

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: Description of the company

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Type of company (education, government, nonprofit, private, public, personal)

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: Address of company

optional_parameters.name: logo
optional_parameters.description: SRC of company logo

optional_parameters.name: linkedinHandle
optional_parameters.description: LinkedIn URL (i.e. /pub/alex-maccaw/78/929/ab5)

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description: List of market categories the company is involved in

api_list.name: flagPersonInfoAsIncorrect
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to let us know if a person doesn’t seem quite right. You can flag a person as incorrect and also optionally pass through a correct set of attributes.

required_parameters.name: personId
required_parameters.description: Id of the person you’d like to flag as inaccurate.

optional_parameters.name: linkedinHandle
optional_parameters.description: LinkedIn url (i.e. /pub/alex-maccaw/78/929/ab5)

optional_parameters.name: googleplusHandle
optional_parameters.description: Google Plus handle.

optional_parameters.name: givenName
optional_parameters.description: First name of person.

optional_parameters.name: facebookHandle
optional_parameters.description: Facebook ID or screen name

optional_parameters.name: employmentTitle
optional_parameters.description: Company title

optional_parameters.name: githubHandle
optional_parameters.description: GitHub handle

optional_parameters.name: familyName
optional_parameters.description: Last name of person. If you have this, passing this is strongly recommended to improve match rates.

optional_parameters.name: aboutmeHandle
optional_parameters.description: about.me handle.

optional_parameters.name: twitterHandle
optional_parameters.description: Twitter screen name

optional_parameters.name: companyDomain
optional_parameters.description: The domain for the person’s employer.

api_list.name: subscribeToPersonInfoUpdates
api_list.description: Subscribe to changes in people’s information.  Whenever we receive updates, we’ll post them to the webhook url associated with your account. This will count as an API call.

optional_parameters.name: facebook
optional_parameters.description: The Facebook URL for the person.

optional_parameters.name: ipAddress
optional_parameters.description: IP address of the person. If you have this, passing this is strongly recommended to improve match rates.

optional_parameters.name: linkedin
optional_parameters.description: The LinkedIn URL for the person.

optional_parameters.name: givenName
optional_parameters.description: First name of person.

optional_parameters.name: company
optional_parameters.description: The name of the person’s employer.

optional_parameters.name: familyName
optional_parameters.description: Last name of person. If you have this, passing this is strongly recommended to improve match rates.

optional_parameters.name: webhookUrl
optional_parameters.description: A webhook URL that results will be sent to.

optional_parameters.name: companyDomain
optional_parameters.description: The domain for the person’s employer.

optional_parameters.name: twitter
optional_parameters.description: The Twitter handle for the person.

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: The city or country where the person resides.
